greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = largest k such that prime(n) + A002110(k) is prime.
comment: a(n) = n-1 iff a(n) is in A035346 for n > 1.
program: a(n) = {k=1; while(k, if(ispseudoprime(prod(i=1, n-k, prime(i)) + prime(n)), return(n-k)); k++)}
results.author: _Altug Alkan_, Dec 01 2015
